solution_line_template: The total distance Terese runs is {monday_distance} + {tuesday_distance}+{thursday_distance} +{wednesday_distance} = <<{monday_distance}+{tuesday_distance}+{thursday_distance}+{wednesday_distance}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles.
Therefore, she runs with an average distance of {total_distance} /{num_days_run} = <<{total_distance}/{num_days_run}={average_distance}>>{average_distance} miles.
